executeBatchInsert

public static void executeBatchInsert()
                               throws java.lang.Exception
Execute batch insert in chunks of 1000, commit every 100,000. If record exists, update with new values. If all string values & date match, record exists. Read from bosToInsert Array (prepared previously).

Throws:
java.lang.Exception
